Alternate Title: They shall not pass! 1914 . . . 1918. Twice have I resisted and triumphed over the Marne.
Creator: Neumont, Maurice, 1868-1930, artist
Description: Poster showing a soldier standing on a battlefield wearing gas mask around his neck.
